entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snow or periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
